greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = 6*A032742(n) + (n mod 6), a(1) = 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: With[{k = 6}, Table[If[n == 1, 1, k (Divisors[n][[-2]]) + Mod[n, k]], {n, 85}]] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 12 2017 *)
program: def a(n): return 1 if n==1 else 6*divisors(n)[-2] + n%6 # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 12 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 11 2017
